comments.body: I think we can just assume the availability of aws cli and use the same mechanism as hacking/aws_config/setup_iam.yml
I did not assume that, because it was not available on CI test builder. But of course I can change that.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +6,10 @@    # ============================================================
    # TODO create simple ansible sts_get_caller_identity module
    - blockinfile:
        path: "{{ output_dir }}/sts.py"
        create: yes
